title: Practical Application and Community Engagement in Emotional Well-being

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of conducting a community needs assessment?
choices: To identify and address gaps between current and desired conditions
To allocate funding for mental health services
To recruit participants for research studies
questions.answer: To identify and address gaps between current and desired conditions

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical method for data collection in a community needs assessment?
questions.answer: Randomized controlled trials

questions.question: What is a key consideration when conducting needs assessments in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Language barriers

questions.question: Which traditional Timorese practice is mentioned as a conflict resolution method?
questions.answer: Tara Bandu

questions.question: What role do Uma Lulik (sacred houses) play in Timorese culture?
questions.answer: Emotional and spiritual well-being

questions.question: Which historical event is mentioned as having a significant impact on collective trauma in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: The 1999 independence referendum

questions.question: What is a key component of an effective emotional intelligence workshop?
questions.answer: Interactive activities

questions.question: How can traditional healing practices be integrated into community-based emotional well-being projects?
choices: By replacing them with modern techniques
questions.answer: Respectfully and with permission

questions.question: What is an important consideration when implementing workshops in Timor-Leste?
choices: Using local facilitators or co-facilitating with local partners
Focusing only on Western psychological concepts
questions.answer: Using local facilitators or co-facilitating with local partners

questions.question: Which document serves as a guiding framework for mental health efforts in Timor-Leste?
choices: National Mental Health Strategy of Timor-Leste
World Health Organization Mental Health Action Plan
questions.answer: National Mental Health Strategy of Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is a key aspect of sustainability in community-based projects?
choices: Leveraging community assets and fostering partnerships
questions.answer: Leveraging community assets and fostering partnerships

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a step in conducting a community needs assessment?
questions.answer: Implement predetermined solutions

questions.question: What is the purpose of including a stakeholder engagement strategy in a project proposal?
choices: To ensure diverse perspectives and expertise are included
questions.answer: To ensure diverse perspectives and expertise are included

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential challenge when conducting needs assessments in rural Timorese communities?
questions.answer: Low literacy levels

questions.question: What is the recommended approach for addressing gender norms in emotional support programs in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Ensure equal participation opportunities

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a culturally sensitive approach to emotional intelligence training in Timor-Leste?
choices: Focusing solely on Western psychological theories
questions.answer: Incorporating traditional stories and proverbs

questions.question: What is the primary goal of community engagement in emotional well-being projects?
choices: To ensure local voices are heard and respected
questions.answer: To ensure local voices are heard and respected

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a key component of emotional intelligence?
questions.answer: Physical fitness

questions.question: What is the recommended approach for evaluating emotional intelligence workshops?
choices: Gather participant feedback and measure changes in knowledge, attitudes, and behaviors
questions.answer: Gather participant feedback and measure changes in knowledge, attitudes, and behaviors

questions.question: Which of the following is an important consideration when designing community-based projects in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Cultural appropriateness

questions.question: What is the recommended approach for addressing potential barriers to workshop participation in Timor-Leste?
choices: Consider factors like childcare and transportation
questions.answer: Consider factors like childcare and transportation

questions.question: Which of the following is a key objective of Learning Unit 6?
choices: Apply learned concepts in real-world settings
questions.answer: Apply learned concepts in real-world settings

questions.question: What type of trauma is specifically mentioned as relevant to the Timorese context?
questions.answer: Intergenerational trauma

questions.question: Which of the following is recommended as a practical experience for students?
choices: Shadow local mental health workers or community leaders
questions.answer: Shadow local mental health workers or community leaders

questions.question: What is the purpose of including a monitoring and evaluation plan in a project proposal?
choices: To assess project effectiveness and make improvements
questions.answer: To assess project effectiveness and make improvements

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a required resource for the course?
choices: "The Body Keeps the Score" by Bessel van der Kolk
"The Power of Positive Thinking" by Norman Vincent Peale
questions.answer: "The Power of Positive Thinking" by Norman Vincent Peale

questions.question: What is the recommended approach for integrating traditional and modern approaches to emotional well-being?
choices: Combine traditional healing practices with modern psychological approaches
Rely exclusively on modern psychological techniques
Keep traditional and modern approaches completely separate
questions.answer: Combine traditional healing practices with modern psychological approaches

questions.question: Which of the following is mentioned as a potential source of additional resources for the course?
choices: Reports from NGOs working on mental health in Timor-Leste
questions.answer: Reports from NGOs working on mental health in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the recommended approach for addressing literacy challenges in needs assessments?
choices: Use visual aids and oral communication methods
Exclude low-literacy individuals from the assessment
Conduct assessments only in urban areas
questions.answer: Use visual aids and oral communication methods

questions.question: Which of the following is an important consideration when organizing a community dialogue on emotional well-being?
questions.answer: Respect local customs and hierarchies
